trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that exposes an element to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe di base che espone un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element.
trans-unit.target: Quando [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] la radice di una query un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] restituisce la radice dell'applicazione su un elemento, il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer per quell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.
trans-unit.target: Il peer risponde anche alle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] query sull'elemento corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando vengono chiamati dal costruttore di una classe derivata, fornisce l'inizializzazione per i valori di classe di base.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> che viene segnalato al client di automazione come origine per tutti gli eventi provenienti da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the source of events.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> che rappresenta l'origine di eventi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida combinazioni di tasti per l'elemento a cui è associato il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Tasto di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination.
trans-unit.target: Se un'applicazione risponde agli eventi di tastiera per fornire comportamento del tasto di scelta rapida, deve restituire una stringa che contiene la combinazione di tasti di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per un elemento che è possibile copiare testo negli Appunti, la proprietà associata potrebbe essere impostata sul valore "CTRL + C".

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Tasto di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per l'elemento associato al peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene la chiave di accesso.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function.
trans-unit.target: Una chiave di accesso (talvolta come tasto di scelta o tasto di scelta rapida) è un carattere nel testo di un menu, una voce di menu o etichetta di un controllo, ad esempio un pulsante che richiama la funzione di menu associata.

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per fornire un metodo rapido per aprire la `File` menu (per cui la chiave di accesso è in genere F), un elemento potrebbe avere la proprietà associata impostata su "ALT + F".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene la chiave di accesso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l'elemento di cui è associato il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di controllo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>dell'elemento associato al peer di automazione.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'identificatore di automazione è il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se tale proprietà non è impostata, il valore è la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'identificatore di automazione è il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se tale proprietà non è impostata, il valore è la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> object that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta le coordinate dello schermo dell'elemento associato al peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of GetChildren elements that are represented in the UI Automation tree as immediate child elements of the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi GetChildren rappresentati nell'albero di automazione interfaccia utente come elementi figlio immediati del peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that is used with <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>, to differentiate the control that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un nome che viene utilizzato con <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>, per distinguere il controllo che è rappresentato da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that is associated with the automation peer that responds to a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> scegliere l'elemento associato al peer di automazione che risponde quando il mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element represents a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a clickable point is any point in the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that issues the command that the button represents when it is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento rappresenta un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, un punto selezionabile è qualsiasi punto nell'area client visibile il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>che emette il comando rappresentato dal pulsante quando viene selezionato con il mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: A point in the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Un punto nell'area selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: A point within the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Un punto all'interno dell'area selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the functionality of the control that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo che descrive la funzionalità del controllo associato al peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The returned string typically provides the same text that is provided by the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita è in genere fornisce lo stesso testo che viene fornito dalla descrizione comando per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: Il testo della Guida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: Il testo della Guida.

trans-unit.source: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Indica [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] in che punto il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] struttura ad albero per inserire il <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> viene ospitato da un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce il contenuto `hwnd` a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] per i controlli che ospitano `hwnd` oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>associato a un elemento che contiene immediatamente un `hwnd` deve eseguire l'override di questo metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> that hosts the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Se questo metodo non è sottoposto a override, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] inserisce il `hwnd` come elemento figlio del <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>che ospita l'intera applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] logical tree.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si desidera eseguire l'override di questo comportamento predefinito e impostare [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] per posizionare il controllo `hwnd` parallela nella posizione in cui si trova nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dell'albero logico.

trans-unit.source: Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Eccetto che negli scenari di hosting, non consentire <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipi per eseguire l'override di questo metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: In addition to overriding this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is cast to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: Oltre agli override di questo metodo, il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipi che sono associati a un elemento che contiene immediatamente un `hwnd` deve restituire il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>che viene eseguito il cast a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>in risposta a WM_GETOBJECT ospitato `hwnd`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: To get a pointer to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere un puntatore a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce il contenuto <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] per i controlli che ospitano <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that conveys the visual status of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo che fornisce lo stato visivo dell'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact might be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, lo stato di un contatto di messenger potrebbe essere "Occupato" o "Online".

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes what kind of item an object represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che descrive il tipo di elemento di un oggetto rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: Examples of the returned string are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Esempi della stringa restituita sono "Documento", "Email" e "Contact".

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> quale fa riferimento all'elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the GetLabeledBy method gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controllo, il metodo GetLabeledBy Ottiene <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>cui è associata a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: In the following image, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> "Themes" is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> also targets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>"Temi" sono indirizzati <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>pertanto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>destinato anche <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> gets focus instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente preme **ALT**+**T**, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>Ottiene lo stato attivo anziché <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") The GetLabeledBy method for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: ![Proprietà di visualizzazione etichettate in base all'utilizzo](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "proprietà dello schermo etichettate in base all'utilizzo") GetLabeledBy il metodo per <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>restituisce <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer>per il corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo un client di automazione per ottenere la stringa di testo che descrive il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento che è la destinazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento che è la destinazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable localized string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> value for the control that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa localizzata leggibile che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore per il controllo associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo che descrive l'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama l'implementazione derivata di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: Il nome.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: È possibile considerare questo valore sotto forma di stringa utilizzato dagli utenti per spiegare il controllo al che quale fanno riferimento.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene utilizzata dagli strumenti, ad esempio l'Assistente vocale per informare l'utente che cos'è il controllo.

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un pulsante con una stringa "OK" deve restituire "OK".

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that lets users select a color might return "Colors".
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>controllo che consente agli utenti di selezionare un colore potrebbe restituire "Colori".</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che è stato assegnato un nome per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in modo che l'accessibilità degli strumenti, ad esempio gli assistenti possono fare riferimento a ogni controllo in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'etichetta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the explicit control orientation, if any.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica l'orientamento di un controllo esplicito, se presente.

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: L'orientamento del controllo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: L'orientamento del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> che rappresenta l'elemento padre di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Il peer di automazione del padre.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, ottiene il pattern di controllo è associato all'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the pattern interface; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this peer does not support this interface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa l'interfaccia del pattern. <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il peer non supporta questa interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> dal punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: La posizione sullo schermo per ottenere la <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> da.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> nel punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: La posizione sullo schermo per ottenere la <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> da.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> nel punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer currently has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento che è attualmente associato a questo peer di automazione con lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> and raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.
trans-unit.target: Attiva il ricalcolo delle proprietà principali del <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> e genera il <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>notifica al Client di automazione se le proprietà modificate.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esempi di proprietà principali includono, ma non sono limitati a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: In genere, gli aggiornamenti e le notifiche vengano eseguiti automaticamente dopo l'aggiornamento del layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: (The update occurs in response to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: (L'aggiornamento viene eseguito in risposta al <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>evento.)</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> In alcuni casi, tuttavia, le proprietà modificate senza generare le <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the whole <xref:System.Windows.Window> moves, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando l'intero <xref:System.Windows.Window>viene spostato, la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>non viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: In this example, the set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio, il set di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>oggetti modificato perché gli oggetti sono espressi in coordinate dello schermo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> must call InvalidatePeer on its peer on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Windows.Window>necessario chiamare il metodo InvalidatePeer sul proprio peer su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: A content element contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento di contenuto contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio di un elemento di contenuto è un elemento in una casella di riepilogo o un pulsante in una finestra di dialogo.

trans-unit.source: You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control.
trans-unit.target: In genere utilizzato non gli elementi di contenuto (definiti anche come elementi delle periferiche) per lavorare con il contenuto in un controllo composito.

trans-unit.source: An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio di un elemento non di contenuto è il pulsante in un controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento è un elemento di contenuto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento è un elemento di contenuto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is understood by the user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento viene considerato dall'utente come interattivo o come parte della struttura logica del controllo nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento è un controllo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento è un controllo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element associated with this automation peer supports interaction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione supporta l'interazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element supports interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento supporta l'interazione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il peer di automazione può ricevere e inviare eventi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Two examples of elements that host `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Due esempi di elementi che ospitano `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: These peers must also override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questi peer devono anche eseguire l'override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento può accettare lo stato attivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento può accettare lo stato attivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un elemento è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo, ma non è ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo ma è nascosto da altri elementi, potrebbe non essere visibile.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento non viene visualizzato sullo schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento non viene visualizzato sullo schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element contains sensitive content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento contiene contenuto riservato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content such as a password; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento include contenuto riservato, ad esempio una password. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento include contenuto riservato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this peer must be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato a questo peer deve essere completato in un form.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento deve essere completato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento deve essere completato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] è in attesa per l'evento specificato.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you call this method before creating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si chiama questo metodo prima di creare il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>che genera l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è una misura delle prestazioni perché se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] non è in attesa per l'evento, non ha senso per creare un peer per generarne uno.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo è statico e risponde solo se è in attesa di un delegato per l'evento specificato in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], non un evento su un elemento specifico.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]può creare listener broadcast; Pertanto, le informazioni per ogni elemento sono irrilevante.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> che indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] è in attesa per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: The class that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe che implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Il peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The proxy.
trans-unit.target: Il proxy.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per generare il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event.
trans-unit.target: Genera un evento di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event to notify the automation client of a changed property value.
trans-unit.target: Genera un evento per notificare al client di automazione di un valore della proprietà modificata.

trans-unit.source: The property that changed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà modificata.

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore precedente della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resets the tree of child elements by calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.
trans-unit.target: Reimposta in modo sincrono l'albero di elementi figlio chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method in certain peer implementations that change the set of child elements in response to a call to a control pattern interface.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo nelle implementazioni peer che modificano il set di elementi figlio in risposta a una chiamata a un'interfaccia del pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, which can change the child elements of the peer by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio è <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, che possono modificare gli elementi figlio del peer spostando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo sull'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
